It is a great game with amazing gameplay ! The community is nice and the people are also quite fresh when you have good trust factor. It's a shame bunnyhopping with the source engine doesn't work anymore, but you can still bhop with the mouse wheel. I recommend this game for people who want to kill time in the quarantine. Avoid cursing and play nicely. Be a positive member of the community!
